name: moan
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, wa(w1, w0)))
-| wi(wa(w1, w0), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, wa(w1, w0)))
-| wi(wa(w1, w0), w0)

comment: "At most one" is still the case when a conjunct is added. (Contributed by NM, 22-Apr-1995.)
